name: mylunch.ie
overview:
mylunch.ie is Ireland’s biggest lunch deals & lunch intelligence website.

mylunch.ie helps consumers find the best value for money at lunchtime by making them aware of interesting lunch options in their area & keeping them up to date on other lunch initiatives, promotions & events.

Consumers search for local lunch options using a search interface, or alternatively the become aware of lunch initiatives through the on-site blog, The Lunchbox.

The company developed out of frustration on the part of the founders that such a service was not provided for adequately in Ireland. It now works with over 300 lunch providers, working with them to help them boost their lunchtime consumer footfall & increase awareness of their offering amongst their target consumers.

mylunch.ie has its headquarters in Dublin, Ireland & the service is targetted at consumer right across the Republic of Ireland.

external_links.title: mylunch.ie: Ireland's biggest lunch deals website
